content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 25, "index": 10}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 35, "index": 12}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 33, "index": 15}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 12, "index": 20}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 11, "index": 25}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 27}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 42, "index": 29}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 31}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 20, "index": 34}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "mooshroom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 39}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 62, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft purpur_pillar, I need to place 2 purpur_slab side by side in the crafting table. I will first move one of the purpur_slabs from slot 21 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 25, "index": 10}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 35, "index": 12}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 33, "index": 15}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 12, "index": 20}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 11, "index": 25}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 27}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 42, "index": 29}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 31}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 20, "index": 34}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "mooshroom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 39}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 62, "index": 43}]
thought: I will now move the other purpur_slab to the right of the first one in slot 1.
act: move from slot 21 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purpur_pillar
inventory=[{"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 25, "index": 10}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 35, "index": 12}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 33, "index": 15}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 12, "index": 20}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 11, "index": 25}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 27}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 42, "index": 29}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 31}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 20, "index": 34}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "mooshroom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 39}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 62, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the purpur_pillar by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
